articles.title: More information on how Google generates titles for web page results
articles.description:
Last month, we shared about our new system for generating titles for web page results. Thanks to
 your feedback, which has been much appreciated, we've further refined our titles system.
 Here's more about what we've been doing and some additional guidance fo…
